Module com.fy916.bubblebobble
Package com.fy916.bubblebobble.controllers.renderer

Class SettingsPageImageLoader

java.lang.Object
com.fy916.bubblebobble.controllers.renderer.SettingsPageImageLoader
public class SettingsPageImageLoader extends Object
The helper of the SettingsController to facilitate the rendering process of the settings page.
Realizes Single Responsibility Principle and FACADE Design Pattern.
Author:
fy916

      Render the difficulties images that to be selected by the player
      Parameters:
      imageplaceholder - the ImageView Image placeholder of difficulties image to be rendered
      difficulty - the difficulty Image that fills the image placeholder

      Render the different color selections of the bubble of the game
      Parameters:
      imageplaceholder - the ImageView Image placeholder of bubble colors to be rendered
      color - the color selection of the image placeholder

    • renderSettingsPageBackgroundpreview

      public static void renderSettingsPageBackgroundpreview​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageplaceholder, int background)
      Render the available selection of the game backgrounds of the game
      Parameters:
      imageplaceholder - the ImageView Image placeholder of the image previews that can be selected to be the background of the game
      background - the selection ID of the background

    • renderSettingsPageCheck

      public static void renderSettingsPageCheck​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView check_difficulty, javafx.scene.image.ImageView check_color, javafx.scene.image.ImageView check_background, javafx.scene.image.ImageView difficulty, javafx.scene.image.ImageView color, javafx.scene.image.ImageView background)
      Render green check that indicates the user selection on the screen
      Parameters:
      check_difficulty - the ImageView Image placeholder of the check that indicates the selection of the difficulty
      check_color - the ImageView Image placeholder of the check that indicates the selection of the color
      check_background - the ImageView Image placeholder of the check that indicates the selection of the background of the game
      difficulty - the difficulty ID of the selection
      color - the color ID of the selection
      background - the background ID of the selection
